What’s happening with your AirPods?

  • AirPods won’t charge

What’s happening with your AirPods?

AirPods won’t charge

Connect AirPods to known good power resource. Is the indictor light on the charging case on?

YESNO

Is AirPods connecting to your phone?

YESNO

Which side of your AirPods needs to be replaced?

LeftRightBoth Sides

You probably have a faulty charging case. Try to charge your AirPods again with a known good charging case.
